---
title: Create Chill Transaction
slug: /guides/staking-api/polkadot/undelegate/create-chill-transaction
---

After collecting the required inputs, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` to proceed to the next step.

### Parameters

All data is already input so the `inputs` object is empty: `{}`

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-6}
curl -X PUT 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/86d4a5d4-1c75-4c6a-926d-ab930e57f504/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "create_chill_tx",
  "inputs": {}
}'
```

### Response

We see two possible `actions`:

- `refresh_chill_tx` &mdash; If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction payload (i.e., the nonce needs to be updated).
- `sign_chill_tx` &mdash; Submit a signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

We will choose `sign_chill_tx`, which indicates one input to collect:

- `transaction_payload` &mdash; The signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

#### Sample Response

```json
{
  "id": "86d4a5d4-1c75-4c6a-926d-ab930e57f504",
  "state": "chill_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_chill_tx",
      "inputs": []
    },
    {
      "name": "sign_chill_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "transaction_payload",
          "display": "Transaction Payload",
          "description": "",
          "type": "signed_transaction",
          "validations": [],
          "signers": ["5GNhcVwpjND83kk6uqMeCjXNUnTSdz84SFyJmd3NmZe4uvrC"],
          "transaction_payload": ""
        },
        {
          "name": "signatures",
          "display": "Signatures",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_signatures",
          "validations": [],
          "signers": ["5GNhcVwpjND83kk6uqMeCjXNUnTSdz84SFyJmd3NmZe4uvrC"],
          "transaction_payload": "",
          "signing_payload": "0x0602070010a5d4e80018004a2400000c000000e143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423ee143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423e"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "controller_account_address": "5GNhcVwpjND83kk6uqMeCjXNUnTSdz84SFyJmd3NmZe4uvrC",
    "controller_proxy_account_address": null,
    "stash_account_address": "5GQmooiNwLwjXnsNp3woVDD3xhkHzcifVVAmdWcb6FaRVA4L",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "maximum": true,
    "chill_transaction": null,
    "estimated_chilled_at": null,
    "unbond_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "0x0602070010a5d4e80018004a2400000c000000e143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423ee143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423e",
      "signed": null,
      "hash": null,
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": null,
      "block_number": null,
      "proxy": false
    },
    "unbonding_era": null,
    "estimated_unbonded_at": null,
    "withdraw_transaction": null
  },
  "network_code": "polkadot",
  "chain_code": "westend",
  "created_at": "2022-10-06T16:15:36.383Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-06T16:17:09.540Z"
}
```

:::info note

Make sure to save the `transaction_payload` from this response, which is what needs to be signed in the next step.

:::
